Dear Sir / Atish
Greetings of the Day !!
GOOD DAY
CLOSE AND DIRECT //
MV DINA OCEAN DWT 24,247 MT BLT 1998 OPEN FANGCHENG , CHINA AT ABOUT 15-20 SEP
MV BEI LUN HAI TUN DWT 69,548 MT BLT 1997 OPEN NINGDE, CHINA AT ABOUT 31 AUG - 1 SEP
MV CS CALLA DWT 37,482 MT BLT 2011 OPEN RIZHAO, CHINA AT ABOUT 1-5 SEP
MV DINA OCEAN
DWT 24,247MT SSW on 9.73M, Fully log fitted
Built 1998 at Tsuneishi Cebu, Class NK, Flag Panama, LOA 154.38M, Beam 26M
G/N 14,762MT/8,447MT, TPC 34.20, H/H 4/4, Grain/Bale 30,811CBM/30,088CBM
Stanchions On Board, 4 x 30MT Cranes. ADA
Speed/Consumption:
About 12.0k on about 14.8mt IFO + abt 0.2mt LSMGO Laden excl ballasting/deballasting/working
About 12.0k on about 14.3mt IFO + abt 0.2mt LSMGO Ballast excl ballasting/deballasting/working
In port Working    about 4.0mt IFO + abt 0.2mt LSMGO excl ballasting/deballasting
In port Idle           about 2.0mt IFO + abt 0.2mt LSMGO excl ballasting/deballasting
MV BEI LUN HAI TUN
69K/97B
FRESH ITIN, WAITING BERTH AT NINGDE AND ETB ON 30 TH AUG, ETD 1ST SEP
DATE ADVANCED AND SERIOS CONSIDER RELET, LC 31-4 TH SEPT
69548/13.26/65.6
13.00/12.00@23.50+0.10//24.50+0.10
2.20/3.00+0.10
BOD ABT 450/50
64990 DWT DUAL APPROVAL
PLSD TO HEAR.
MV 'CS CALLA'
FLAG/BUILT/TYPE - BAHAMAS/2011/ SINGLEDECK/BULK CARRIERS
CLASS  - LLOYDS
DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT - ABT 37482.20 MT/10.4 M SSW
LOA/BEAM/ TPC - 189.99M/28.5 M/50.1MT ON SSW INT. GR/NT - 24065 / 12148 ICE CLASS - 1C / CO2 FITTED / A60 BULKHEAD / AWWF HOLD LADDER FITTED 5HOLDS/HATCHES/HYDRAULIC FOLDING/NATURAL VENTILATION  4 X 30 METRIC TONNES CRANES
CUBIC BREAKDOWN  GRAIN/BALE CU.M   48,934.39 CU MTRS  47,848.41 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H1   7,587.79           7,483.80 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H2  10,760.84          10,490.08 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H3  10,760.84          10,490.08 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H4  10,760.84          10,490.08 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H5   9,064.08           8,894.37 CU MTRS
SPEED/CONS
ECO SPEED/CONSUMPTION          ABT 11.5 KTS/ABT 19.7MT (L)   ABT 12.0 KTS/ABT
19.7MT (B) VLSFO
EEXI SPEED/CONSUPTION           ABT 13.4KTS/ABT 22.7MT (L)    ABT 13.4 KTS/
ABT 21.7MT (B) VLSFO
AN ADD. QTTY OF 0.2 MT MDO/DAY AS PER PRACTICE FOR FO CHANGE OVER, GENERATOR STARTING, INCINERATOR, BOILER, ETC.
AT PORTCONDITION IDLE  ABT 2.5MT VLSFO
AT PORTCONDITION WORKING (24HRS) ABT4.5 MT VLSFO
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION ARE GIVEN BASIS UP TO BEAUFORT 4, NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3. VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO USE MDO FOR MANOEUVRING IN NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STARTING ENGINES AND ON ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS AND ADVERSE WEATHER OR WHEN THE GENERATOR IS ON LOW LOAD. VESSEL ALSO HAS LIBERTY TO USE MDO/MGO IN HER MAIN, AUXILIARY ENGINES & BOILER WHEN REQUIRED BY LOCAL REGULATIONS. "ABT" TO BE -0.5KTS FOR SPEED AND +5% FOR FUEL CONSUMPTION. BUNKERS SUPPLIED TO BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO
SPECIFICATIONS:VLSFO: ISO 8217: 2005 ISO-F-RMG 380 MDO: ISO 8217:2005 ISO-F DMC SULPHUR CONTENT NOT EXCEEDING 1.5% STATUTORY LIMIT OUTSIDE ECA FOR MAIN ENGINE, GENERATOR ENGINE AND BOILER. LSGO: ISO 8217:2010 ISO-F DMA MAX. 0.1% SULPHUR CONTENT FOR MAIN ENGINE, ENERATOR ENGINE AND BOILER WHILE IN ECA.
BUNKERS SUPPLIED TO BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO SPECIFICATIONS:VLSFO: ISO 8217:
2005 ISO-F-RMG 380 MDO: ISO 8217:2005 ISO-F DMC SULPHUR CONTENT NOT EXCEEDING 1.5% STATUTORY LIMIT OUTSIDE ECA FOR MAIN ENGINE, GENERATOR ENGINE AND BOILER.
LSGO: ISO 8217:2010 ISO-F DMA MAX. 0.1% SULPHUR CONTENT FOR MAIN ENGINE, ENERATOR ENGINE AND BOILER WHILE IN ECA.
NO MIXING OF VLSFO BUNKERS ALLOWED BUT MIXING OF LSMGO BUNKERS PERMITTED.
ALL FIGURES OR DETS ABT
Best regards
Atish Wajage
